scripts.dev:server: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm --prefix server run dev
scripts.build:react: cross-env PUBLIC_URL=. npm --prefix client run build
scripts.clean:all: rimraf node_modules package-lock.json client/node_modules client/package-lock.json server/node_modules server/package-lock.json
scripts.prep:client: npm --prefix client ci || npm --prefix client install
scripts.prep:server:electron: cross-env npm_config_runtime=electron npm_config_target=31.3.0 npm_config_disturl=https://electronjs.org/headers npm --prefix server ci || npm --prefix server install
scripts.prepack: npm run prep:root && npm run prep:client && npm run prep:server:electron && npm run rebuild:server:electron && npm run build:react && npm run deps:electron
scripts.predist: npm run prep:root && npm run prep:client && npm run prep:server:electron && npm run rebuild:server:electron && npm run build:react && npm run deps:electron
scripts.predist:win: npm run prep:root && npm run prep:client && npm run prep:server:electron:win && npm run rebuild:server:electron:win && npm run build:react && npm run deps:electron
scripts.prep:server:electron:win: cross-env npm_config_runtime=electron npm_config_target=31.3.0 npm_config_disturl=https://electronjs.org/headers npm_config_cache=%USERPROFILE%\.electron-gyp npm --prefix server ci || npm --prefix server install
scripts.rebuild:server:electron:win: echo 'Warning: Cross-compilation of SQLite from macOS to Windows requires Docker or Windows machine' && npm --prefix server install better-sqlite3 --no-optional
scripts.dist:win:full: npm run predist:win && npm run dist:win
scripts.dist:win:docker: docker run --rm -ti --env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false --env ELECTRON_CACHE="/tmp/.cache/electron" --env npm_config_runtime=electron --env npm_config_target=31.3.0 -v ${PWD}:/project -v ~/.cache/electron:/tmp/.cache/electron electronuserland/builder:wine /bin/bash -c "cd /project && npm run prep:root && npm run prep:client && npm run prep:server:electron && npm run build:react && electron-builder --win --publish=never"
